notes.text: sap.m.MenuWraper: respects content density
sap.m.Avatar: Fix image not visible, when initials are incorrect
sap.m.Dialog/Popover: Styles are fixed when integrated with WebC
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: set label to correct elements
sap.m.ColorPalette: adjust keyboard interactions
We've now fixed the issue of tiles not scrolling left or right when buttons are pressed on the slideTile control
sap.m.SegmentedButton: fixed initial truncation of some button texts
sap.m.IllustratedMessage: correct CSS variable references
sap.m.StepInput: Prevent overwriting incorrect values in the internal input
Texts are now selectable on mobile devices
sap.m.RatingIndicator: reset rating on second click of the same star
sap.m.SegmentedButton: improved button width calculation
sap.m.Button: Press event is fired correctly on pressing SPACE
sap.m.Popover: Set shadow style according to the "showArrow" property
sap.m.Menu: Added optional chaining to avoid errors when MenuWrapper is not present
sap.m.TimePicker: A hand pointer has been added for the hover state
sap.m.Menu: Fix binding of menu items
sap.m.DatePicker: adjust picker accessible name
sap.m.SuggestionsPopover: Correct text color for additional info
sap.m.Button: has correct css parameters for active Emphasized
